title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: Basic Attention Token is an Ethereum-based content and commercial stage sent off in 2017. It has Brendan Eich and Brian Bondy as the fellow benefactors. Its local token is called BAT.Basic Attention Token (BAT) Price Prediction 2022BAT cost was swinging from $0.36 resistance2 to $0.35 resistance1 in the wake of contacting the help level of $0.30. It turned around from the help level of $0.30 and presently going sideways on the lookout and is supposed to be bullish before very long. In the meantime, our drawn-out BAT Price Prediction for 2022 is bullish since it can't break the current help level soon. We can anticipate that BAT should reach $1 in 2022.

Asset prices can go up and down in the near future.

We can anticipate that BAT should reach $1 in 2022.overall this project is really good and quality, I have been a publisher for them, since it was closed the publisher there seems to get people's interest also decreased, there are only big people playing there without a big community that sincerely supports them, I don't sure will see $1 at the end of this year as the market is not good for this year

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on September 19, 2022, 07:33:35 AMBasic Attention Token is an Ethereum-based content and commercial stage sent off in 2017. It has Brendan Eich and Brian Bondy as the fellow benefactors. Its local token is called BAT.Basic Attention Token (BAT) Price Prediction 2022BAT cost was swinging from $0.36 resistance2 to $0.35 resistance1 in the wake of contacting the help level of $0.30. It turned around from the help level of $0.30 and presently going sideways on the lookout and is supposed to be bullish before very long. In the meantime, our drawn-out BAT Price Prediction for 2022 is bullish since it can't break the current help level soon. We can anticipate that BAT should reach $1 in 2022.Even with purely speculative asset with purely technical outlook for potential market value growth, no. At least not in near future until we turn from this bear market. BAT has a relatively large community so that could help it a lot in the bull market shilling department but if we look purely fundamentals, maybe i am not understanding the reason for it. People have explained it to me and i have understood what they said but i can't still see any good reason for it to exist. Even moons in reddit make more sense if you can buy ads with them in the future.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: I don't find BAT such a special coin to be honest as it doesn't really bring anything new or innovative. It just got some attention as you can get some free BAT when using the Brave browser but that's about it. In a bull market all coins will be go up, so that will be that the same for BAT also.

comments.author: bocyaj
comments.body: Their are lot of potential coins in the crypto currency market.Now the market was very low,many of the trusted altcoin price was low.It’s better to invest ton the long reputed coin as compared to the new coin like BAT.We can’t waste the money at the less potential coin.When the mark was in dump,the pump will give you huge money on the upcoming ways.Just hold your coin,til the price was change to normal one.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: This token has good support and a good chart. Of course, it's no longer a gem and it's unlikely to earn x100 on an investment in BAT, but it's quite suitable for long-term investment. Maybe in the next bull run, BAT will be able to cross the $2 mark. Right now the price is around $0.30. I think it's a good start to start investing.

comments.author: SirLancelot
comments.body: Quote from: ahmia39 on September 19, 2022, 03:34:27 PMGiven the current state of the crypto asset market, it is very important to do in-depth research, such as looking at news, planning future projects, price movements, expert analysis, and much more.Keep in mind that, crypto has a fairly high volatility. Asset prices can go up and down in the near future.But BAT isn't just an ordinary coin or a newly released coin. You are not aware of this coin before arent you? But you can just read the description given above by the op. It's mentioned that this coin started in 2017. The current state of the market is still in bearish, I think all of us know what to do during these times.As long as we know that the coin is reputable and we have a feeling that it can be a good addition in our collection then we should not waste time but we should buy that coin as soon as possible because we don't know what if the bull run will start these coming days/weeks? We already know that cryptos are volatile but it's not a disadvantage.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: BAT is the best investment and I've made a profit last year, but I don't see any good potential to see the price of BAT go up this year because we haven't entered a bull market, maybe you also know that all crypto markets are currently down

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on September 19, 2022, 09:18:07 PMThis token has good support and a good chart. Of course, it's no longer a gem and it's unlikely to earn x100 on an investment in BAT, but it's quite suitable for long-term investment. Maybe in the next bull run, BAT will be able to cross the $2 mark. Right now the price is around $0.30. I think it's a good start to start investing.in the next bull run I doubt BAT will be able to touch $2, most likely BAT will only touch $1 (as the highest price for the next bull run). So far, I see that the development of BAT is not so significant, besides that the use case is not very visible, so I have doubts about the long-term future of BAT.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on September 20, 2022, 07:16:23 PMQuote from: Xal0lex on September 19, 2022, 09:18:07 PMThis token has good support and a good chart. Of course, it's no longer a gem and it's unlikely to earn x100 on an investment in BAT, but it's quite suitable for long-term investment. I think it's a good start to start investing.in the next bull run I doubt BAT will be able to touch $2, most likely BAT will only touch $1 (as the highest price for the next bull run). So far, I see that the development of BAT is not so significant, besides that the use case is not very visible, so I have doubts about the long-term future of BAT.If the crypto market can raise $3-5 trillion in the next bull run, then BAT's rise to $2 is not so unlikely, given the rate at which coins are pumped with liquidity during such periods of excess liquidity. Perhaps this BAT rush will be fleeting after reaching such a price, but in some short period of time it is very likely, because we are not talking about BAT raising $10-15 billion in capitalization, $3 billion will be enough for it.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I like this coin, it's the incentive when you use their browser and that's one reason why it had became popular. So, it's a both win for the browser and this token alone.Quote from: bitcampaign on September 20, 2022, 06:27:07 PMBAT is the best investment and I've made a profit last year, but I don't see any good potential to see the price of BAT go up this year because we haven't entered a bull market, maybe you also know that all crypto markets are currently downThat's good to hear, how much you've earned from it?

comments.author: bounceback
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on September 19, 2022, 09:18:07 PMThis token has good support and a good chart. Of course, it's no longer a gem and it's unlikely to earn x100 on an investment in BAT, but it's quite suitable for long-term investment. Maybe in the next bull run, BAT will be able to cross the $2 mark. Right now the price is around $0.30. I think it's a good start to start investing.Yes, it's true that the next bull run will most likely bring the price of the BAT coin to the level of $2 because if we look at the price movement chart last year the price of the ATH coin was in the $1.8 area so I think it's not too bad if we plan to invest with it for the long term because currently the BAT coin is still on CoinMarketcap's first wall at number 75 based on its trading volume capacity.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: This token was really popular back in 2017. I quickly topped at $1 and made people a lot of money. Right now however you don’t really hear anything about it. The hype is gone.Sure it pumped to $2 back in late 2021 but so did most coins. I just think this will have a slow bleed and go nowhere really. Especially in the middle of a bear market.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: I don't consider it a good investment. It's use cases are limited to just being a reward token. Something similar could be done with only a database. The token seems unnecessary. It's value derives from being associated with Brave browser not on having any actual demand or utility.

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: I think, i have better option to invest as like polygon for me. But i agreed, BAT is a good coin because it’s surviving back in 2017. I earned good amount of tokens by using their brave browser, i think it’s their main utility feature. It’s enough reputed coin but i'm not satisfied with their development at the stage of 2022. Right now it’s price going very low, so that it’s right time to buy for the bull market.

comments.author: globalpain
comments.body: when viewed from the BAT chart, BAT is very suitable to be traded in the short term, because pump and dump occurs in BAT, because it is also seen from the distribution of BAT supply that it is also 100%, meaning that BAT will actually be at that price, only if BAT able to breakout from $1.7 then BAT will go to new ATH, yes my advice is better for trading than for long-term investments.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: This is a very bad investment for now. The volume has been decreasing so hard. This token was a worthless token. I don't know why people are still seeing this as a potential investment despite the fact that if the value was always going down and this token never got pumped by the whales. It seems like brave is not become the best browser again for now. The tip may be worth nothing

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on September 19, 2022, 07:33:35 AMWe can anticipate that BAT should reach $1 in 2022.That is very unlikely this year as we are already in a bear market. Maybe in the next bull marketQuote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on September 20, 2022, 07:16:23 PMin the next bull run I doubt BAT will be able to touch $2, most likely BAT will only touch $1 (as the highest price for the next bull run). So far, I see that the development of BAT is not so significant, besides that the use case is not very visible, so I have doubts about the long-term future of BAT.i think it will touch $2 in the next bull run, that's an easy target for it given that in 2021 it went close to $1.7 and In the previous bull market the all-time high was $0.9
